20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Mujammi' ibn Jariyah al-Ansari,: Khaybar was divided among the people of al-Hudaybiyyah. The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) divided it into eighteen portions. The army contained one thousand and five hundred people. There were three hundred horsemen among them. He gave double share to the horsemen, and a single to the footmen

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي حُكْمِ أَرْضِ خَيْبَرَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Ruling On The Land Of Khaibar
